TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlIDConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.

span.span: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並提供在設計階段環境中的屬性方格控制項中顯示的控制項 Id 的清單。The class derives from the class and provides a list of control IDs for display in a property grid control in design-time environments. 類別也可做為基底類別和類別，也就是 Web 控制項，以及支援驗證屬性的屬性，會分別針對型別轉換子。The class also serves as the base class for the and classes, which are type converters for Web controls and controls that support validation property attributes, respectively. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)或[一般化類型轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用需要的類別中來呈現控制項的 ID。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a class that requires a to render the ID of a control. `DebugInfoControl`很簡單，會列印出目前的 Web 表單所包含的控制項上的一些資訊。The `DebugInfoControl` is a simple control that prints out some information on a control contained by the current Web Form. 其`ControlID`屬性以裝飾，其中指定為用於該屬性。Its `ControlID` property is decorated with a that designates the as the to use for that property. `DebugInfoControl`會覆寫`Render`方法，以列印出資訊中的目標控制項控制項。The `DebugInfoControl` overrides the `Render` method to print out information about the target control in a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/CS/debuginfocontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/VB/debuginfocontrol.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何`DebugInfoControl`可用於 Web Form 連同控制項來顯示資訊有關控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the `DebugInfoControl` can be used in a Web Form along with an control to display information about the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/CS/debuginfocs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlIdConverter_1/VB/debuginfovb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式物件。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例。For more information, see the examples in .

summary.span: Returns a value indicating whether the control ID of the specified control is added to the that is returned by the method.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the control ID of the specified control is added to the that is returned by the method.

span.para: 實作方法會傳回在所有情況下。類別衍生自覆寫這個方法以提供自己的篩選機制。例如，類別覆寫方法並傳回只有控制項是 Web 伺服器控制項。

The implementation of the method returns in all cases. Classes that derive from the override this method to provide their own filtering mechanism. For example, the class overrides the method and returns only if the control is a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容器中找到的每個控制項上呼叫方法。The method is called on each control found in the container. 識別碼只能加入至控制項如果該方法會傳回`true`。The control ID is only added to the if the method returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法一律會傳回`false`。As implemented in this class, this method always returns `false`.

span.para: 如果您想要轉換的型別支援標準值，請覆寫這個方法。 參數可以用於擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從該環境叫用的。這個參數可以是，和內容物件的屬性可能會傳回。

Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values. Use the parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. This parameter can be , and properties on the context object can return .
